title: We can't stand still can we?
creator_credit: Ken McCready, Roman Bittman and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film is about the urban renewal plan drawn up by the town council of High River, Alberta. It saved the town, and could save many others across Canada.
creator_credit_for_label: Ken McCready, Roman Bittman and National Film Board of Canada
